alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Northern Acadia; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lafayette, northeastern Acadia and south central St. Landry Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cankton, or near Carencro, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Scott, Carencro, Church Point, Arnaudville, Sunset, Duson, Grand Coteau, Cankton and Mire. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 93 and 106. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
